2.Dialogue: Hey there! D'you wanna learn how to write like [rainbow]THIS??
2.Speaker: Bhgt

4.Dialogue:
[rainbow][wave]Awesome!![/wave][/rainbow]
So, all I used was [u]Bb Codes[/u].
They have a syntax like this:
[ bb code name ] your text here [/ bb code name ]
4.Speaker: Bhgt

5.Dialogue:
[u] Bb codes[/u] have different names for different purposes.
u for [u]underline[/u]

shake for [shake]scared people[/shake]

wave for [wave]ghooost sounds[/wave]

tornado for [tornado]dunno why[/tornado]

rainbow for [rainbow]SPARKLES![/rainbow]

Combine them all for [rainbow][shake][wave][tornado]MORE MADNESS!!
5.Speaker: Bhgt

7.Dialogue:
The text above produces this:
[shake][rainbow] PARTAY [/rainbow][/shake]
7.Speaker: [shake][rainbow] PARTAY [/rainbow][/shake]
